title: Approaches to estimating probability
body: A district transportation director is modeling bus arrival reliability. For training purposes, she creates a simplified simulation in which buses can arrive “Early,” “On Time,” or “Late.” She assumes each outcome has an equal theoretical likelihood for demonstration purposes. She asks trainees to calculate the probability that a bus arrives on time based solely on these three equally likely outcomes.
courseName: EEPL614 Quantitative Methods for Educational Leadership
